full_text: Knitted baubles in DROPS Lima. The piece is worked in the round, bottom up, with Nordic pattern. Theme: Christmas. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DROPS Design: Pattern li-171 Yarn group B SIZE : Circumference = 21 cm. Diameter = 7 cm. YARN : DROPS LIMA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 100 g colour 0100, off white 100 g colour 3609, red ACCESSORIES : Wadding. 1 bauble weighs approx. 12 grams, without wadding. NEEDLES : DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3 MM. DROPS CROCHET HOOK SIZE 3 MM. KNITTING TENSION : 23 stitches in width and 32 rows in height with stocking stitch and Nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
